website_summaries.verdict: These Safety 1st knob covers prove more durable than less expensive brands.
pros: Easy to take on and off for cleaning
Black color is more attractive on a lot of stoves
Not as noticeable in the kitchen
cons: Will not fit over knobs on certain gas stoves or professional model knobs

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you have a gas stove and kids, these are a must have. They don't make the knobs totally kid proof, but removes the inadvertent twisting of the knobs by a child who is just curious. They have to truly be invested to take these off and get to the knob. They are a little annoying for grown-ups to always have to remove to use the stove, but worth it. Why gas stoves ever put the knobs within child's reach is beyond me. Hmmm... a little dial you can turn and release flammable gas into your house, that seems crazy dangerous and I am normally on the spectrum of, "eh, go play in the street kid, you will be fine."
customer_reviews.author: Amazin-Pete

customer_reviews.title: Best brand I’ve used so far!
customer_reviews.text: Way more durable than the two previous brands I bought. They don’t break like other brands because they are placed differently on the oven knob. And they don’t over heat if someone has the stove door open too long. I actually had a previous brand melt in seconds. I like the color as well since our oven is black and chrome. My toddler can’t get these off. He figured the other ones out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: They came in a sealed box. The box wasn't damaged or unsightly. The knobs were very easy to put on and over the oven switches. I didn't even look at the instructions. Would order again! They will do fine to protect my toddler from the oven and the house from gas leaks.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Barely works with Viking D3 with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: These are just a little too small to work out of the box with a Viking D3, but they're the biggest I could find, so I made it work. They needed some tool work to make it fit (cutting a small slit near the bottom to the left or right of the hinge so it would expand enough to fit around and behind the metal ring behind the knob, as well as cutting out the small strip that latches it in place -- which is fine since it's such a tight fit that friction holds it closed just fine), but it's better than having the dog turn on the stove when we're not home.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We had no trouble putting them on our small stove in a little apartment. Since our child has seen us push them closed when she's around, if they are open, she will reach up and close them. They are easy for me to open with one hand. Works good and solves any possibility she will turn this on by accident.
customer_reviews.author: kc2dallas

customer_reviews.title: Life savers!
customer_reviews.text: We came home from the movies one evening several years ago to the smell of gas. It appeared that one of our cats had used a burner knob for a spring board and had manage to move it in and to the burner hi position in the process (momentum and leverage). Very scary and it could have been tragic if it had happened at another time. I wanted to get rid of the gas range, but my wife loved it. Installing these kept her happy and we haven't had an issue since. Our cat continues to deny responsibility to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: Two of them broke on me - I don’t think they’re well-suited for the heated environment around a stove. Both of them eventually cracked and broke apart - leaving us with a foam sticker ring around the knobs that’s a pain to remove. If you’re getting these to protect against kids then I wouldn’t recommend them. Putting the release button on top just means if your kid simply just grabs and pulls down they’re likely to open and expose the knob anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome safety product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for homes with gas stoves and kids! Our stove knobs are surprisingly easy for little hands to reach and turn. I first bought these when babyproofing the house four years ago and I just bought these to replace the originals. These are easy to install and easy to use. Over time the little hinge on the covers broke which meant the cover wasn't staying over the knob. But considering that I use them every day, I still think these are great. The black blends in nicely with my black stove.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Serves their purpose well
customer_reviews.text: These are great! the knobs on our gas oven have a tendency to turn on if we bump them with our hips moving around the kitchen. This eliminates this issue my only frustration is they are so big that when we open the oven door they knock into it every time but they move out of the way on their own. my daughter who is 10 months old has also tried to reach for the oven knobs and this stops her from turning them on as well!
customer_reviews.author: J.Gold

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dog from turning our knobs on
customer_reviews.text: These are easy on and off. You need to remove them if you want to use your broiler, but we don't very often. We got them to keep,our dog from accidentally turning the gas knobs. For that they help us sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stanford, Award-winning Author & Poet

customer_reviews.title: Better Safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: A little cumbersome but safe. I'd accidentally turned on my range twice from front mounted controls, once burning myself from melted plastic from a basket I had there and 2nd time ruined two containers of hummus...maddening and dangerous. Much better now and not too hard to use. The gray color looks better than clear and can remove if have company I suppose or cooking a lot during the day.
customer_reviews.author: TrytoBuySmart

customer_reviews.title: it will look really great. The knobs are great
customer_reviews.text: If you have dark windows on your stove, and your stove is chrome or chrome-looking, it will look really great. The knobs are great, but the purpose is to keep babies AND dogs off the knobs and accidentally turning on your stove. This has deterred them!
customer_reviews.author: Guitarplayer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t broil them like I did!
customer_reviews.text: These knob covers worked very well to keep my toddler grandsons from turning on my burners. They are easy to install, and I would recommend them. However, you must be careful to remove them before using your broiler or they melt! It would be great if they could be made of something more heat proof.
customer_reviews.author: mlg

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, looks nice - functionally...4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars, except that I'll have to take them off , or lift them up at the same time in order to open the oven. Came in orginal packaging, and I appreciate that there was no additional wasteful plastic packaging, as is sometimes the case with Amazon. Not sure if that's a design flaw, or the nature of the beast in terms of a knob covers in general though. REALLY easy to install - literally took me 90 seconds. HUGE plus.
customer_reviews.author: SpyBRE

customer_reviews.title: Too brittle, breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Thorgouhly disappointed. In concept these are good, in execution they're crap. Mostly plastic construction with a metal pin as axle for swivel. The plastic hinge snap on to this metal piece but are way too brittle, with just occasional use it snaps and the lid falls off. 2 broken in 2 month with just occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc2912

customer_reviews.title: Stove Knob Covers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The knobs on my stove are on the front. We have accidentally turned a unit on twice since buying it. These slip off easily to clean and are not that noticeable since the stove is black. An extra knob being included was also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: brenda c parsons

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy! They open up to allow you to turn the knobs, which I love. My toddlers don't have consistent access to my kitchen, so these are basically a "just in case" precaution. If a toddler was alone with them for an extended period I'm sure they'd be able to figure out how to open them. I think that's pretty standard with any child proofing item though.
customer_reviews.author: SGZ

customer_reviews.title: Work great on motorhome stove
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for the stove on our motorhome because our dog was turning the gas on the stove on when unsupervised. They work great. Since installing we have had no more incidents. To clean them I take them off and put them in the dishwasher as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great for keep dogs from burning down my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs would try to steel food off the stove and accidentally turn on the stove. This was easy to install and gives me piece of mind that my dogs aren’t going to burn down the house. They are super easy to clean and too.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Holt

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Our LO has discovered she can reach more things that mommy and daddy use-the stove being one of them lol. So, having a gas stove, covering them was a priority (didn't want to NOT find out she had turned them on one night).
customer_reviews.author: mcyr75

customer_reviews.title: Life saver literally
customer_reviews.text: Literally saving our lives and dinner every day. However Home Depot sells for half the price, but that’s my fault I should have price shopped. But when you see little able to reach those knobs you panic
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and works REALLY well. Live in an ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and works REALLY well. Live in an RV and use them to cover our gas stove knobs so our dogs (who accidentally turn on the propane burner by looking at what is on the stove) can't accidentally turn the knobs!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. Did exactly what I wanted and they don't take away from the aesthetics of my kitchen. Some people commented they couldn't see that their dial was "off" while these are in place, but I can see mine just fine. I actually needed these because my dog likes to jump up in that corner of my kitchen for her treats, and both she and I have bumped the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I like these knobs because they blend in with my stainless and black. Our old ones were clear and great. These tinted ones look like they are part of my kitchen. They are easy to use and install. They look great and are an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Pittman214

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM!! THEY WERE SUPER EASY TO INSTAL AND WORK GREAT. FITS THE COLOR OF MY STOVE KNOBS TOO. SUPER EASY TO REMOVE, USE AND CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica6

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used these to stop my cats from turning on the gas knobs in my stove as it is a built in and the controls are angled in the front. These covers went on easily and they have stopped the cats from walking on the stove
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Goodbrod

customer_reviews.title: Knobs are safely covered!
customer_reviews.text: My twins aren't mobile and tall enough yet to get at the stove, but I've already got these in place and really like how they function. Our nanny also said these would be great in a house with an Altzheimer's patient, like the people she used to work with.
customer_reviews.author: MASAMSCAS

customer_reviews.title: Do not work well
customer_reviews.text: These are difficult to open and very loose on standard Maytag knobs. Double-sided tape and 3M command strips did not stick well to my stainless steel range, and they began to melt while oven is in use. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: T. Handley

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I seriously wished I would have bought these years ago. My grand kids kept turning my gas on. It scared the crap out of me. Now I have no worry’s. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson foley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For us these were a must have. We have cats and a couple of times we smelled a faint odor of propane in the house as the cats hopped on the stove and we're playing with the knobs. Don't quite know how they were able to turn anything but my guess is they pressed just hart enough. It has also stopped the accidents push and turn when folks for some reason lean against the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Ended problem
customer_reviews.text: I needed this after my kids bumped into stove and gas leaked in the house for several hours before we noticed. They install in seconds And if kids bump into stove the knobs dont move.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholicsshh

customer_reviews.title: Stove Knob Coversa
customer_reviews.text: Whey are great but we have found that if you have an over stove microwave you lean against them and you will break a hinge or two on the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Notadev

customer_reviews.title: Stove Knob Covers
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to use yet very safe so my granddaughter can’t get at the stove knobs. Love the fact that they flip so you don’t lost them. Had a different set and one cover fell in the stove and we didn’t know it - melted!
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A must have for every parent.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put on and does the job of hiding the knobs from our curious 1 year old boy. These are so good our toddler thinks they are toys and plays with them rather than being annoyed that he can't reach the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look great with stainless/ black stove
customer_reviews.text: look great with stainless/ black stove , My Great Dane was snoopy and bumped the handle , when I came home the house was filled with natural gas smell, These were a must have after that !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good covers for the stove knobs. They arent that durable and will eventually break off. Fine for what they are, but expect to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: DMJ

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set we bought. The first set we had for 6 years. Replaced them cause they were dirty ...... but held up nice!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Shuba

customer_reviews.title: These are great - they look perfect on our black gas stove ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great - they look perfect on our black gas stove and they fit. Its been a lifesaver keeping our little one from turning on the gas. I would highly recommend this as a staple for anyone with little kids that like to explore (every kid LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The Baby can open them!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great for our kitchen stove so that our 10 month could not accidentally play with or turn on the gas. He figured out how to open then with in 2 days. To be fair they clip together and it is really easy to unclip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and safe.
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo has yet to figure these knobs out. We keep a baby gate on our kitchen but even us adults have bumped the stove and the gas has turned on. These covers are excellent for safety and very easy to clean. Look new after several months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Britt T

customer_reviews.title: works great and looks great with the stainless steel stove
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep the cat from stepping on the stove knobs, works great and looks great with the stainless steel stove! Easy to put on and remove for cleaning and one push button to use. Highly rec for pets or kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: These cover are nice, however the description does not say they do ...
customer_reviews.text: These cover are nice, however the description does not say they do not work with push knobs, and they were 1/8" too small for the knobs on my LG gas range.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be difficult to use when cooking but it is super easy, just open the knob and leave it open while using the burner. Worth the security of knowing that no one (in our case a dog) is going to turn on the gas!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: Feeling safe. I already ordered one like this but it was so small for my stove. So I ordered this product and its awesome. My one year old switch off the stove whenever I lit it..now he is trying to figure out omg what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: Siva

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these because my cat kept jumping on the knobs and the knobs would turn and subsequently turned the stove on. Ever since i got these knobs the problem has been solved.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: These work great and keep our daughter from turning on our gas stove! Plus they aren't super annoying to open and close when we need to use the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sito

customer_reviews.title: The knobs on my stove turn too easy. So far these seem to prevent that and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because twice we've accidentally turned on the gas without the burner lighting and left the house. The knobs on my stove turn too easy. So far these seem to prevent that and look just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: They blend in well on my stove.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put on but a little difficult to use the gas knobs when these are on. For the protection against kids messing with it it's okay. Also you can't notice them on my stove and blend really well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Argueta

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with my stove
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these don't seem to work with my gas stove. They're too big, and when you try to turn the stove on it will turn on the gas but not light the burners (eek) Will have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaD

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying for safety
customer_reviews.text: These protect my gas knobs from being turned on by my toddler, but she likes to play with these instead. Would rather her play with these than turn on the gas stove. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Addy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY WIN
customer_reviews.text: if you have toddlers then you need this on your stove, no worries if you have these about the kids accidentally turning the gas on. I recommend these to anyone with kids. Easy to open as an adult when you need to use the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I have a VERY curious puppy who about got us blown up one day. I like the color but , they sag a bit , and you can't open and close the oven. I am back to square one. Taking all the knobs off stove
customer_reviews.author: Leona Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: Parenting win!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, knob covers that fit our stove. And just in time as our toddler started playing with the knobs shortly after we installed them. But he can’t get himself into trouble now. Parenting win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby-proofing
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for to protect toddler from turning stove knobs. Easy to install and easy to lock and unlock when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works well, look good. My only complaint is they are designed as one size fits all so they rattle around on my knobs because the hole is so big. But overall i'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Bill

customer_reviews.title: Dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: I came home one day and my dog had turned the gas burner on. Luckily it lit. I purchased these and there is no way for my dog to turn the burners on again. They are strong enough to withstand her jumping and our day to day use. I put these on my feidgidaire gas stove and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brazda

customer_reviews.title: it's ok..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking it would fit perfectly for my stove but noticed that it moves around and it's not tight.
customer_reviews.author: eangel2010

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and a half, she still can't open it as well as doesn't even think about messing with the oven anymore
customer_reviews.author: At'Tifa M.

customer_reviews.title: a 2 year old can open these
customer_reviews.text: my 2 year old grand daughter can open these covers not very child proof luckily I heard a hissing sound and turned burner off don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: These dark knobs look better on the stove and the little guy doesn't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: These dark knobs look better on the stove and the little guy doesn't seem to pull them off as he did with the white ones (which he broke)
customer_reviews.author: Josephine A. Micciulla

customer_reviews.title: Work great for us
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for us and match our stove so you don’t even notice that they’re on. My wily 2-yr-old hasn’t been able to figure them out yet
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: every time you close the oven they get in the ...
customer_reviews.text: every time you close the oven they get in the way and hold the door open. Im sure they wont last long because I'm sure they will break.
customer_reviews.author: ahventure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the covers being cumbersome to use while cooking, but they were surprisingly easy to open and close. Bonus, they don't look too terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great but easy to break
customer_reviews.text: They work greak but theyre easy to break in the same spot, this is second set that i buy
customer_reviews.author: ninosaurio

customer_reviews.title: Good Product to learn more about your history
customer_reviews.text: Product is better than just the common plastic stove covers. I like it, it is durable, it looks good, and it is made well.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN D BANKS

customer_reviews.title: Open kitchen must have this
customer_reviews.text: For those who has open kitchen and kids this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Not dog proof lol
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and seemed like they’d be great. Unfortunately, my dog is able to remove them and I keep finding them chewed up on the kitchen floor. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install! Our stove is brand new and the knobs are very touchy, if you walked by and bumped them the gas would turn on. These are loose over the knobs and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: MomOF5

customer_reviews.title: Great but break
customer_reviews.text: These look and work awesome! They do break if you run into them though. I had 2 broken ones so I just bought a second pack to replace the covers as they break.
customer_reviews.author: MamaChevy

customer_reviews.title: They do their job.
customer_reviews.text: I thought you could pinch them to turn the job but you actually have to open them.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, look really good and sleek, fit my very small stove (city living --not full size) worth every penny knowing we won't burn the house down when we bump the stove!
customer_reviews.author: 08csaund

customer_reviews.title: Love these knobs
customer_reviews.text: Love these knobs, feel safe knowing I can not accidentally turn on gas. Very easy to put on and use. Would recommend using them for safety if you have small children.
customer_reviews.author: Red Hatter

customer_reviews.title: They are helpful but they get in the way of ...
customer_reviews.text: They are helpful but they get in the way of my oven door opening and closing cause they are quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Julieeebean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, easy to install, breaks after time I just purchased new ones. They look great
customer_reviews.author: Alzira Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Some toddlers may be able to open this.
customer_reviews.text: Just watch out for your toddler. Mine was smart enough to open the gas on the stove, good thing I was supervising him.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to use and works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that like to climb on our stove top and use the knobs as a foot step. We have come home and even woken up to a heavy gas smell in our apartment (scary!) so we knew we had to find a solution fast. These are easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Work quite well,
customer_reviews.text: Work quite well, but would be nice if they did not spin around and had a clearer window/gap to see the burner settings.
customer_reviews.author: A&R

customer_reviews.title: Works but annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I think the design could be improved. Perhaps if they flared out so the knob was more accessible when open.
customer_reviews.author: TravisFW

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome safety covers. We have a GE profile gas stove and the covers aren’t as snug as I would have preferred and the ability to see your heat setting is a struggle Bc of the tint. Otherwise totally worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly easy to install and use. The black blends right in with my stainless steel and black range so they don't even look out of place like most babyproofing products.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zobel

customer_reviews.title: These covers are great. Easy to open for adults and will keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great . Easy to open for adults and will keep little hands away. May not work well on smaller knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Teacha

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little covers so that my cat can brush up against the knobs on my stove and turn it on. She's a little piece of work.
customer_reviews.author: TARA CARLIN

customer_reviews.title: They are large and you have to adjust to see ...
customer_reviews.text: They are large and you have to adjust to see what temp you are setting but they keep the kids out.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Conley

customer_reviews.title: Great Stove Knob Covers
customer_reviews.text: Has held up again my 1 year old so far. He can not get them off, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Melton

customer_reviews.title: Need a couple more
customer_reviews.text: Only wish I could purchase a couple more. My stove has 6 knobs. Would have been nice to customize total.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanne Ballweg

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on GE Stove
customer_reviews.text: We have a GE stove. It fits well. Build quality is good, not great. Serves the purpose. I’ll give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ezio Auditore da Firenze

customer_reviews.title: I am more than satisfied with the knobs
customer_reviews.text: I am more than satisfied with the knobs! My stove is further out than the microwave above, and the gas knobs have been bumped on a number of times when using the microwave. With using these covers I know this will not happen. They are very easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Wallacewell wrutreb

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy they are to install. The tinted color goes with a black stove better than the clear.
customer_reviews.author: J6801

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. However they break pretty easy at the hinge. I would keep extra on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Guppy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these knob covers. And, they are stylish too
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not for all knob types!
customer_reviews.text: Do not get these if your knobs are not flush against a surface. We did not realize this and actually broke our knob trying to install this!
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby proof
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and use and they look pretty nice on my stove. Best of all they keep little hands from turning on the gas.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Beck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Easy to use and most importantly they keep my baby safe!!! They also look good against my black stove.
customer_reviews.author: James M McAmis

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keeps my son from being able to turn on or off knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Originally got broken 1 in box but they corrected it and no issues. Looks good, 4 year old doesn’t even play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: easy to open/close and clean
customer_reviews.text: Simply put: easy to open/close and clean. Gives us peace of mind around our gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: tmc1218

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for when the grandkids are around and they looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! They hang loosely and get in the way of opening the oven door. You have to keep putting them on and off to do so. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the color for my black and stainless steel stove. Easy to use only thing that's annoying is if you leave one open while cooking it gets stuck in the door of the oven when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.chach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These keep us from bumping into the gas knobs and accidentally turning on the gas.
customer_reviews.author: momather
